title.narrative: OUTPUT 5.5: COMMUNICATION FOR DEVELOPMENT

description.narrative: Output 5.5 Communication for Development, which contributes to Cross-Sectoral Communication For Development. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: OUTCOME 5. EVERY CHILD HAS AN EQUITABLE CHANCE IN LIFE. The most excluded girls, boys and adolescents in LAC benefit from equitable policies, budgets and programmes to ensure they develop to their full potential in an equitable manner in alignment with the Sustainable Development Agenda 2030.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Output 5.5 Communication for Development

description.narrative: LAC COs strengthened capacities in SBC (C4D, ;RCCEandAAP) by building regional networks, partnerships and strategies; accelerated the response to COVID-19 and other emergencies and disasters towards people-centered interventions, and improved the implementation of theAAP Common Mechanismsin Priority Countries to respond COVID-19 and migration flows.Countries reached progress, such as increasing 13% of C4D strategies ongoing (52 in 2020 vs. 46 in 2019), and 43% of planned (30 vs. 21); the development of RCCE plans to respond COVID-19 by 8 COs and the fulfillment of all the regional goals on AAP established in coordination with EMOPS. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:30/03/2021
